dublin_core.dcvalue: Victims of severe hypothermia and cardiac arrest may appear dead They are often unresponsive to on scene resuscitation including defibrillation while profoundly hypothermic Several cases of extreme hypothermia and prolonged cardiac arrest with good outcome have been published We present a case of heart rate monitored by pulse watch hypothermia prolonged cardiac arrest and survival with complete recovery of neurological functions
Heart rate monitored hypothermia and drowning in a 48-year-old man. survival without sequelae: a case report.
